This plugin enables the assignment of the Uniform Resource Names to the issues, articles and galleys in OJS.
Please configure the URN plugin to be able to manage and use URNs in OJS:
Journal Content
Please choose the objects URNs should be assigned to.
Please select the publishing objects that will have Uniform Resource Names (URN) assigned:
Issues
Articles
Galleys
URN Prefix
The URN prefix is the fix, never changing part of the URN (e.g. "urn:nbn:de:0000-").
The URN prefix pattern must be in the form "urn:"<NID>":"<NSS>.
URN Suffix
A URN suffix can take any form, but must be unique among all publishing objects with the same URN prefix assigned:

Use the pattern entered below to generate URN suffixes. Use %j for journal initials, %v for the volume number, %i for the issue number, %Y for the year, %a for the OJS article ID, %g for the OJS galley ID, %f for the OJS file ID, %p for the page number and %x for "Custom Identifier".
For example, vol%viss%ipp%p could create the URN suffix "vol3iss2pp230".
